en.title: Grade Calculator
en.seoTitle: Grade Calculator - What Will My Final Grade Be?
en.metaDescription: Free grade calculator to calculate your current grade, final grade, and what you need on your final exam. Perfect for students tracking their academic performance.
keywords: what grade do i need calculator
longTailKeywords: what do i need on my final calculator
en.description: Calculate your current grade, predict your final grade, and determine what score you need on your final exam to achieve your target grade. Perfect for students at all levels.
en.summary: Calculate grades, final exam scores needed, and track academic performance.
instructions: Enter your current grade or assignment scores
Input the weight of each assignment or exam
See what score you need on your final exam

seoContent.introduction: Our free grade calculator helps students calculate their current grade, predict their final grade, and determine what score they need on upcoming exams to achieve their target grade. Whether you're in high school, college, or university, this tool makes grade tracking and academic planning simple and accurate.
benefits: Calculate your current grade based on completed assignments
Determine what score you need on your final exam
Plan your study time effectively
Track weighted assignments and exams
Reduce grade anxiety with clear projections
Support for percentage-based and point-based grading
steps: Select your grading system (percentage or points)
Enter your completed assignment scores and their weights
Input your desired final grade
Enter the weight of your remaining assignments or final exam
Get instant calculation of the score needed
inputsExplained: Assignment Scores: Enter the grade you received on each completed assignment
Assignment Weights: Enter the percentage each assignment counts toward your final grade
Desired Final Grade: Enter the grade you want to achieve in the course
Final Exam Weight: Enter what percentage the final exam counts toward your final grade
seoContent.formulaExplanation: Grade calculation uses weighted averages. Your current grade is calculated by multiplying each assignment score by its weight, summing these values, and dividing by the total weight of completed assignments. To find the score needed on your final exam: (Desired Grade × 100%) - (Current Grade × Current Weight) = Score Needed × Final Exam Weight. This formula accounts for the proportional contribution of each component to your final grade.
examples: Current grade: 85%, Final exam worth 30%, Want 90% final → Need 101.7% on final (may be impossible)
Current grade: 78%, Final exam worth 25%, Want 80% final → Need 86% on final
Current grade: 92%, Final exam worth 20%, Want 90% final → Need 66% on final (easier target)
resultsExplanation: Current Grade: Your grade based on completed assignments
Score Needed: The grade required on remaining assignments to achieve your goal
Feasibility: Whether achieving your goal is possible (score must be ≤100%)
Grade Projection: Your estimated final grade if you achieve the needed score
seoContent.whoItsFor: This grade calculator is essential for high school students tracking semester grades, college students planning for final exams, parents helping children understand grade requirements, teachers demonstrating grade calculation concepts, and anyone wanting to understand how weighted grading systems work. It's particularly useful during midterms and finals when students need to know exactly what scores they need to achieve their target grades.
seoContent.disclaimer: This grade calculator provides estimates based on standard weighted average calculations. Actual grades may vary based on your instructor's specific grading policies, curves, extra credit opportunities, or rounding rules. Some courses use more complex grading schemes. Always confirm grade calculations with your instructor or syllabus. This tool is for educational planning purposes only.
relatedTools: GPA calculator for cumulative grade point average
Average calculator for simple grade averaging

faqs.question: How accurate is this calculator?
faqs.answer: This calculator uses industry-standard formulas to provide accurate results based on your inputs. Results are estimates and may vary.

faqs.question: What information do I need?
faqs.answer: You'll need the specific input values required by the calculator. All required fields are clearly labeled.

faqs.question: Can I save my results?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can save results by taking a screenshot or noting the values for future reference.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, all calculations are performed locally in your browser. We don't store your data.

faqs.question: How often should I use this?
faqs.answer: Use the calculator whenever you need to make calculations or when your situation changes.

es.title: Calculadora de Calificaciones
es.seoTitle: Calculadora de Calificaciones - ¿Cuál Será Mi Nota Final?
es.metaDescription: Calculadora gratuita de calificaciones para calcular tu nota actual, nota final y lo que necesitas en tu examen final. Perfecta para estudiantes.
es.description: Calcula tu calificación actual, predice tu nota final y determina qué puntuación necesitas en tu examen final para alcanzar tu meta.
es.summary: Calcula calificaciones, notas de exámenes finales necesarias y rastrea rendimiento académico.

seoContent.introduction: Our free grade calculator helps students calculate their current grade, predict their final grade, and determine what score they need on upcoming exams to achieve their target grade. Whether you're in high school, college, or university, this tool makes grade tracking and academic planning simple and accurate.
benefits: Calculate your current grade based on completed assignments
Determine what score you need on your final exam
Plan your study time effectively
Track weighted assignments and exams
Reduce grade anxiety with clear projections

steps: Select your grading system (percentage or points)
Enter your completed assignment scores and their weights
Input your desired final grade
Enter the weight of your remaining assignments or final exam
Get instant calculation of the score needed
seoContent.formulaExplanation: El cálculo de calificaciones usa promedios ponderados. Tu calificación actual se calcula multiplicando cada puntuación por su peso y dividiendo por el peso total.
examples: Nota actual: 85%, Examen final vale 30%, Quieres 90% → Necesitas 101.7% (imposible)
Nota actual: 78%, Examen final vale 25%, Quieres 80% → Necesitas 86%
